title: BinCtx: Multi-Modal Representation Learning for Robust Android App Behavior Detection
summary: Mobile app markets host millions of apps, yet undesired behaviors (e.g., disruptive ads, illegal redirection, payment deception) remain hard to catch because they often do not rely on permission-protected APIs and can be easily camouflaged via UI or metadata edits.
